title: The new draft pick glitchs and give you skins

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: I do not own this skin and it seems to just gave me the skin

replies.body: Thank you Rito, for not leaving out us broke plebs.

Congrats on the 100th post regarding this matter. In the future, please search the forums and add to existing posts to help draw attention for Riot!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
